Europe has many different climates, but is dominated by Dfb.

Classifications

Classification Count Köppen-Geiger Examples Warm humid continental climate 479929 Dfb Astana, Karaganda, Ust-Kamenogorsk, Pavlodar, Hakodate Oceanic climate 331986 Cfb Melbourne, Johannesburg, Soweto, Port Elizabeth, Canberra Hot-summer Mediterranean climate 75750 Csa Istanbul, Allahabad, Lucknow, Varanasi, Izmir Humid subtropical climate 38850 Cfa Tokyo, Hanoi, Sydney, Yokohama, Durban Warm-summer Mediterranean climate 31122 Csb Cape Town, Mitchells Plain, Blue Downs, Bellville, Elsiesrivier Hot humid continental climate 19719 Dfa Sapporo, Almaty, Aktobe, Sinŭiju, Matsumoto Warm humid continental climate 19424 Dsb Hacıbektaş, Kaza, Trespone, Gemur, Ağrı Subarctic climate 17738 Dfc Stepantsminda, Kumlistsikhe, Soldeu, Pas de la Casa, Perisher Valley Cold semi-arid climates 9020 BSk Baku, Ulaanbaatar, Yerevan, Asmara, Taraz Hot humid continental climate 5475 Dsa Ankara, Shymkent, Taldykorgan, Kargil, Khovaling Subarctic climate 1018 Dwc Hot semi-arid climates 505 BSh Delhi, New Delhi, Hyderabad, Ahmedabad, Pune Tropical rainforest climate 496 Af Singapore, Medan, Kuala Lumpur, Pekanbaru, Wonosobo Tundra climate 384 ET Tropical savanna climate 342 Aw Mumbai, ಬೆಂಗಳೂರು, Bangkok, Bengaluru, Ho Chi Minh City Subpolar oceanic climate 331 Cfc Miena Subarctic climate 259 Dfd Tropical monsoon climate 241 Am Jakarta, Sylhet, Chittagong, Semarang, Makassar Cold desert climates 238 BWk Aktau, Kyzylorda, Atyrau, Leh, Sumur Hot desert climates 120 BWh Cairo, Alexandria, Giza, Dubai, Jodhpur Warm humid continental climate 108 Dwb Subarctic climate 64 Dsc Sarchu Mediterranean climate 33 Cs Tropical savanna climate 9 As Dry-summer maritime subalpine climate 4 Csc

Display all climates

Astana

Astana The climatic conditions in Astana are mostly characterized by a frigid and moderate climate. Astana has a significant amount of rainfall during the year. This is true even for the driest month. The Köppen-Geiger climate classification identifies this particular weather pattern as belonging to the category of Dfb. The mean yearly temperature recorded in Astana is 4.2 °C | 39.6 °F, as per the available data. About 401 mm | 15.8 inch of precipitation falls annually.

Graphs

Click one of the graphs for more information.

Karaganda

Karaganda The climatic conditions prevalent in Karaganda are distinguished by a chilly and temperate weather pattern. In Karaganda there is a lot of rain even in the driest month. As per the Köppen-Geiger classification, the prevailing weather conditions in this region are categorized under Dfb. The mean yearly temperature recorded in Karaganda is 4.1 °C | 39.3 °F, as per the available data. The precipitation level on a yearly basis amounts to 408 mm | 16.1 inch as per the meteorological records.

Graphs

Click one of the graphs for more information.

Ust-Kamenogorsk

Ust-Kamenogorsk The weather conditions prevailing in Ust-Kamenogorsk are characterized by a cold and moderate climate. The rainfall in Ust-Kamenogorsk is significant, with precipitation even during the driest month. The climate is classified as Dfb according to Köppen and Geiger. The mean yearly temperature recorded in Ust-Kamenogorsk is 4.2 °C | 39.5 °F, as per the available data. The annual precipitation in this location is approximately 597 mm | 23.5 inch.

Graphs

Click one of the graphs for more information.

Pavlodar

Pavlodar The weather conditions in Pavlodar are characterized by a chilly and moderate climate. Pavlodar is a city with a significant rainfall. Even in the driest month there is a lot of rain. The climate is classified as Dfb according to Köppen and Geiger. The average temperature in Pavlodar is 4.2 °C | 39.6 °F. The annual rainfall is 348 mm | 13.7 inch.

Graphs

Click one of the graphs for more information.

Hakodate

Hakodate The climate here is mild, and generally warm and temperate. It is noteworthy that Hakodate experiences a considerable volume of precipitation throughout the year, including its least humid month. The Köppen-Geiger climate classification identifies this particular weather pattern as belonging to the category of Cfb. The mean yearly temperature recorded in Hakodate is 8.2 °C | 46.8 °F, as per the available data. The precipitation level on a yearly basis amounts to 1209 mm | 47.6 inch as per the meteorological records.
